name: "The Office" US Version Season 2 Trivia Game | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Whose desk did Michael sit at, while his office was being cleaned, after the stain was found on his carpet?
questions.explanation:
Jim's.

	Michael sat at Jim's desk while Roy and Darryl tried to get the stain and strong odor out of his office.  Jim went back and sat in Toby's old desk by Kelly.

questions.text: In the episode where Michael burns his foot on his George Foreman grill, who goes to pick him up and bring him to the office.
questions.explanation:
Dwight.

	Dwight rushes out of the office when he hears Michael squealing in pain on the telephone.  He then crashes his car into a pole and pukes on the back of it, before taking off once again to go and pick up Michael.

questions.text: What was the date that Pam and Roy set for their wedding?
questions.explanation:
June 10.

	On the booze cruise, Roy finally decided to set a date for their wedding and Pam happily agreed.  Jim was so upset by this that he went out on deck and talked to Michael about his feelings for Pam.

questions.text: Where did Michael and Jan share their first kiss?
questions.explanation:
Outside Chili's.

	Michael and Jan had a successful business meeting and Jan became a little bit intoxicated.  She shared a kiss with Michael that she would later regret because Michael formulated in his mind that they had begun a relationship.

questions.text: On performance review day which day of the week did Dwight think it was?
questions.explanation:
Friday.

	Dwight was certain that it was Friday.  Jim and Pam did everything they could to keep him thinking that.  On the next day, which was actually Friday, he came running into work late, it was the first time he had ever been late to work.

questions.text: Oscar is revealed to the audience be gay this season.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Oscar missed a day of work and Dwight tried to prove all day long that he was faking his illness.  When Dwight showed up at Oscar's house, he was getting out of the car with his date.  Oscar made up a story to cover up, but Dwight was too dumb to realize what was going on and never caught on that Oscar was gay.  It is officially not announced by Oscar until the third season that he is in fact gay.

questions.text: What kind of car does Michael Scott drive?
questions.explanation:
Chrysler Sebring.

	Meredith drive the Dodge Caravan, Dwight drives the Pontiac Trans Am, and Jim drives the Toyota Corolla.

questions.text: After Jim and Michael have lunch at Hooters, what does Michael do to himself to be more like Jim?
options: Ties his jacket around his waist
Wears a pencil behind his ear
questions.explanation:
Messes up his hair.

	Michael's usually slicked back look gets changed, following his lunch with Jim.  He messes it all up and has everyone in the office asking him if he is wearing a wig.

questions.text: Does Jim ever reveal to Pam in this season that he is in love with her?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Jim tells Pam that he is in love with her in the last episode of season two during the episode "Casino Night".

questions.text: Who was the first person in the office to learn of Jim's feelings for Pam?
questions.explanation:
Michael.

	Jim let it slip on the booze cruise that he had feelings for Pam.  In the next episode, Michael ended up telling the entire office of Jim's feelings.  Jim then felt it was necessary to tell Pam that he used to have a crush on her.
